physical_examinations.relevant_findings: At 3 months of age, her physical examination showed hyperpigmentation and respiratory distress.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: During her admission, the patient exhibited severe respiratory distress, leading to septic shock.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical exam showed pubic hair Tanner stage 3, genital Tanner stage 2–3, and mild increment in testicular volume (2–3 ml each).

physical_examinations.date: At the age of 2 yr 9 months
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination showed frontal bossing, low-set ears, normal penis, and unilateral cryptorchidism.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Bone age was 2.5 yr by age 5 yr 11 months.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination showed frontal bossing, wide nasal bridge, small low-set ears, right cryptorchidism.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Developed a severe respiratory distress syndrome and eventually died 5 days later.
